Renata Moreno

About me

I’m Renata Moreno, originally from Brazil. I graduated with Graphic Design. Art creativity has always been accompanied to me throughout my life. I feel complete and fulfilled when I’m traveling and creating content for myself or for my clients. I know I came to this Planet to share beauty, stories & unique moments with amazing humans.

My services

Content Creation

I believe we can create something beautiful together whether we take your current concept or we create a consistent content for your social media platforms. My goal it to impress your audience, to reach the exactly public and also to impress you upon delivery. I aim to create original content that is representative of your brand with quality, creativity and singularity.

Photography

I would love to be part of your life and create something unique together. I’m in photography and video world since when I was a child -with home videos and all kind of photography. When I turned eleven years world I had my first film camera. So for me photography it was always about art and raw moments. I never stop since then, I took it very serious three years ago with Lifestyle Photography. For me photography it’s more than a pixel junction, it’s a visual diary.

Modelling

I’m passionate about being a model, it’s in my nature. I want to start connecting with you, and be ready for what your plans are. I can be a model for your brand as an influencer and create a beautiful content to post in my Social Media. I’m able to travel and be a model for a photographer/ filmmaker in any part of the world. I can’t wait to be a model for a Creative Photographers and Filmmakers, where I can see the magic happening. I’m ready to start!

Let's work together

I love partnering with like-minded companies that fit my brand and that would interest my audience. While I am always open to hearing your ideas and specific goals, these are the main services that I offer:

I can offer a full suite of photography service, including the creative direction, location scouting, shooting, and professionally editing.

I am currently based in Brazil but regularly work with international brands who send me their content to shoot or on destination campaigns in exotic locations. I'm also available to travel for the right products, including press trips and tourism campaigns.

I'm also able to offer combined content creation + social media management packages. For more details, click on the website link below or send through an enquiry for more details.
